    android.view.View.OnClickListener, URIContent, HashtagContent, HashtagSearch, Action, Delete, GoTo, Visibility, HierarchyListItem, HierarchyListItem2, MapItemUser

    public class HashtagContentListItem
extends AbstractChildlessListItem
implements HashtagContent, Visibility, GoTo, Delete, MapItemUser, android.view.View.OnClickListener
    List entry that represents content under a hashtag listing
